heading: HR00769
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO THE V-MALL HOSTAGE INCIDENT ON 02 MARCH 2020 IN ORDER TO ADOPT THE NECESSARY REFORMS IN EXISTING LAWS AND ENACT RELEVANT NEW LAWS TO SAFEGUARD THE RIGHT TO LIFE
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY since 2020-05-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00769
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO THE V-MALL HOSTAGE INCIDENT ON 02 MARCH 2020 IN ORDER TO ADOPT THE NECESSARY REFORMS IN EXISTING LAWS AND ENACT RELEVANT NEW LAWS TO SAFEGUARD THE RIGHT TO LIFE

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
